website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for an alarm clock that helps train your younger kids to stay in bed longer, this is a great, affordable option.
pros: Ball glows red for "time to sleep" and green for "time to wake up."
Powered by an AC adapter or 3 AA batteries
Includes settings for two alarms and a nap timer
cons: Definitely not something that is ideal for older kids

customer_reviews.title: The product itself is great. It works fine
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great. It works fine. The red loght though. It kept my children up all night waiting for it to turn green. They sleep in a dark room and this was just a distraction. Wish you could turn the red light off until like 1 hour before wake up or something
customer_reviews.author: Andy Duckhorn

customer_reviews.title: You have to re-set the alarm every day
customer_reviews.text: Every night you have to reset the alarm in order for the light to turn green in the morning. There is no way to just set it once to turn green every morning at the same time. I bought this thinking it was the easiest most user-friendly light-up "alarm" clock, but it's useless so I will be returning it...
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my daughter in her bed
customer_reviews.text: We were having issues with my 2 year old waking up too soon. She'd wake up a few hours early and start fussing and we'd have to get up and settle her down. We bought the dog to teach her about sleeping for a period of time and when it's time to get up. Now, when she wakes up early, she checks "her dog" and knows if it is time to get up yet. My only complaint is that the controls panel is a little complex and it's not very easy to set a nap timer.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan & Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: The clock itself is nice, but the parent controls that are supposed to ...
customer_reviews.text: The clock itself is nice, but the parent controls that are supposed to be inaccessible by the child are incredibly easy for my 3 year old to get to. When she touches the clock the first thing she does is open the back and push the buttons. She turns the alarm off, turns the nap timer on, adjusts the brightness...at this point, it’s kind of useless except as a light-up toy for her.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but could be redesigned to be perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My toddler used to enter my room at 1am, 3am, and 5am. After buying this, he now stays in his own room! I tell him that when the red light is on, Mr Doggy protects him from monsters and the monsters leave. When the light turns green it’s time to wake up. I was shocked that such a simple concept worked. I wish that I didn’t have to manually turn on the light every night and that the control door is easier to open. Price, value, and it works to keep your toddler in their room makes this a must buy.
customer_reviews.author: Skeptical

customer_reviews.title: Would be a great product...IF it worked
customer_reviews.text: This clock would’ve gotten 5 stars IF it hadn’t broken after a week of use. After only a week or so most of all of the buttons on the back stopped working. I can sometimes get them to work if I press really hard or jiggle them around for a while. Not sure if I received a dud or all of them are made like this. Too bad I had already thrown away the original box or I would have returned or asked for another one. Too bad it broke so quickly because it’s a great concept and my little one loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Carriere

customer_reviews.title: Great idea!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based mainly on the reviews and lack of sleep. My two littles loved this as soon as they saw it. The didnt get the concept until the next morning when I kept asking if the ball was green. The only complaint is the amount of buttons on the back and trying to set the alarms/nap timer. I tend to hold the buttons too long or not long enough to set them. But I would definitely recommend this to other parents.
customer_reviews.author: saisha sandoz

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1st month
customer_reviews.text: My boys loves this puppy, we taught them about the red/green and they caught on so quickly. Worked great the first 3 weeks. Unfortunately the puppy keeps “losing” time. I set the correct clock time and when I check the next morning the clock face reads a random time (11am, 2pm) instead of 8am. For some reason the “buzzer on” option also keeps turning on automatically. We have done a reset, changed batteries twice and nothing seems to help. (I would suspect my 2 year old triplets, but puppy is kept on a really high wall shelf.) I and my children are really disappointed. If anyone else has had this problem and found a solution please let me know!
customer_reviews.author: Diane M. Barber

customer_reviews.title: It keeps my kid in bed!
customer_reviews.text: Great little product. Easy to set up and my son loves it. It actually keeps him in bed in the morning. I had little expectations since my little boy loves to get up early and wake up the house pre-dawn. I cannot believe he actually does wait until the light turns green. I do like that you can control the brightness. I just wish you could turn the brightness down even further. Even on the lowest setting it casts a semi- bright red light. I;m sensitive to lights at night so that's my only complaint. But I do like this little product. It works :)
customer_reviews.author: EAP

customer_reviews.title: good not great
customer_reviews.text: Lots of options for alarms, brightness, sleep timer. I wish the clock numbers were more visible, making it more user friendly as the kid got a bit older and even at 25% brightness for the red ball, its still pretty bright, I wish it could go a bit dimmer. Other than those two things, its working--daughter sits in her bed till it turns green.
customer_reviews.author: RunnerKate6

customer_reviews.title: GAME CHANGER
customer_reviews.text: This thing changed my life! Haha. And I’m not being dramatic. After so many 5am wake up calls from my 4-year-old and 2-year-old, we put this in their room. They caught on immediately and actually really loved it. They played together in their room until the light turned green at 7am and then they could come wake me up. But the best thing ever is that after a couple weeks, they started sleeping in! Sometimes past 7! It’s like the clock taught them better sleeping habits.
customer_reviews.author: MerkleyFamily

customer_reviews.title: Ours didn't keep time accurately
customer_reviews.text: We were excited to try this out and see if it would help our kids know when its morning and they can get out of bed. Unfortunately it doesn't keep time accurately, we checked on the kids an hour after it should have changed colors and they were awake waiting for the light to change colors. (Looks like the theory at least would work) I thought the kids had pressed buttons, because the time was 12 hours and some minutes off. But when I put them to bed tonight the time was wrong again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli O.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, but some toddlers will defeat it
customer_reviews.text: If your toddler isn't the type who will figure out how to modify the programming, this is surely an excellent product. Unfortunately, our 2.5-yr-old grandson is a gadget freak, and had the rear compartment open in under 10 seconds and managed to set the brightness to 100% and who knows what else. But his little brother (3 months) seems like he's not the type to do that sort of thing, so we'll keep it and maybe it will be useful for him when he's older. Anyway, at least the 2.5-yr-old likes the dog. He takes it to bed with him and turns on one of the alarms so that it lights up red. He says "now the doggy is sleeping".
customer_reviews.author: xgrep

customer_reviews.title: Love this for my Toddler
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great find. My toddler had been getting up in the middle of the night so this was the perfect solution. She knows that "red means stay in bed" and gets so excited when she stays in her bed until it turns green. It's very easy to program and makes an amazing night light; I love how I can adjust the brightness. It's very durable, as my toddler has gotten a hold of it a couple times and it's still in great shape! I feel like it's an amazing value for all of it's features.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney N.

customer_reviews.title: Great training tool for our toddler
customer_reviews.text: We love this clock. It has greatly reduced the battle in the wee hours of the morning, because we can point to the red light as proof it's not time to be up yet. If you are looking for a cure all this is not it, they will still get up, but it is a good training tool. Our son loves turning on his clock and in the morning when it turns green he comes in and says my doggie says it's time to get up. I read a lot of reviews and had been on the fence, but am glad we tried it. It has worked as well as expected.
customer_reviews.author: MCM

customer_reviews.title: Broken in less than 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Back in March, I discovered that the button for changing the time stopped working, and I was unable to adjust the clock for daylight savings. We had a power outage this week and now I know that I also cannot disable the buzzer. We always had to push pretty hard to get the buttons to work, but now they don't work at all. Other than that, it worked fine initially - though we always found it a bit too bright. I also wished that the numbers were larger so that my kids would be able to use the clock to learn to tell time. They loved the dog, though, and are very upset that it has stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Jen KK

customer_reviews.title: Love it, But Doesn't Last
customer_reviews.text: So I love everything about this puppy clock. It has been a life saver when it comes to my husband and being able to get more sleep. However, this clock does not seem to last long. First off, you have to change the battery like every 4-6 weeks. And then just after a year of using it, it breaks. Looking at other reviews, I am one of many people who have had this problem. I wish there was something that could be done about it.
customer_reviews.author: HappyMama89

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a child who seems to get up often ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a child who seems to get up often while they’re supposed to be napping or sleeping! Easy to use- fun for the kids- I have a few children who seem to get up often during nap time... now with the big red rooster, all of a sudden, I have children who stay in bed during nap time! Perfect for my use!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great but clock kept resetting
customer_reviews.text: This clock is exactly what i have been looking for with my daughter. Its easy to use and very clearly detailed. Its also cute and my daughter loves her clock. However, it constantly resets itself. It is super annoying. I even had it replaced hoping that i just had a defective item, but the same thing happened in less than 24 hrs. I even changed the batteries. I finally gave up and just used the included ac adapter. Its been 2 days and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my 3 year old sleeping
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old has always been a sleeper but it was like he was losing time and instead of getting up at 7 or 7:30 A.M. he started getting up at 5 or 5:30 A.M. sometimes even 4:40ish. I bought this basically as a guide to help him see when he should get it up since he can’t tell time yet. We’ve used it the last two nights and he stays in his bed until it turns green. Super easy to use, even has little controls that he can use to turn the ball off once it’s time to get up. I would definitely recommend this another parent.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Sigh
customer_reviews.text: This arrived with some sort of short. It took me a while to figure out what was going on but there's a disconnect somewhere and it drains the battery in 3 nights. This is ridiculous. And I can't plug it in, I have a 2 year old who goes after cords. Replacing a battery every 3 days is excessive and to expensive. Especially frustrating and my kid loves the dog.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Petroff

customer_reviews.title: Red means: "STAY IN BED!"
customer_reviews.text: My boys now know, "Red means, STAY IN BED"! And we are so excited about that. Kids, not so much. So, this has SO many buttons on the back for use, so that does make it a bit difficult to figure out. I am sure we are not utilizing all the options it provides. Honestly, we just needed the red at bedtime and the green to indicate the "ok to wake" time. Light works, clock works. We are pretty happy. The back has a flip door that closes over the buttons. This is not hard to open and a child could open it easily. I just put it on the top shelf where it is not accessible to the kids.
customer_reviews.author: C MOM

customer_reviews.title: Hang in there. It will work.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and her two-year-old daughter. The first night they used the puppy, my granddaughter cried all night (well, til 4:30 am), wanting to come into her parents' room, but my daughter held strong. I mentioned to my daughter that one of the reviews that I had read regarding the sleep-training puppy stated that the parent noted the street traffic lights to her toddler: the red traffic light meant stop, so mommy stopped, and the green traffic light meant go so then mommy could go. My daughter tried sharing the traffic light analogy with her toddler, and the second night: Success!! Yay!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda W.

customer_reviews.title: This really did “train” my kid to sleep in
customer_reviews.text: It has 2 setting so I have one alarm for weekdays and one for weekends. You can have it beep at the time, or just change from red to green. Before this clock my daughter was getting up at 6am everyday without fail. It didn’t matter if I delayed bedtime or put her down early. Now I can get her to sleep until at least 7, sometimes more. And if we go away without the clock she gets up early again.
customer_reviews.author: CrystaMariee

customer_reviews.title: Worked until it didn’t.
customer_reviews.text: Word of advice for parents—don’t open the back panel to turn on the alarm on in front of your kid. Worked wonderfully for one night, then my 3-year old figured out how to “turn the ball red” on her own (after seeing me open the back of the clock). Once she realized she could manipulate it, the magic dog lost its power over her 😫 Suggestion to the manufacturers—maybe make the back panel child proof?
customer_reviews.author: SVE

customer_reviews.title: Worked for us immediately.
customer_reviews.text: Have a little one that was getting up every morning between 1am and 6am. It was becoming a real problem for the family. Bought this product and set the alarm with light and no buzzer. Worked immediately, explained to my young one that they were to stay in bed until someone in the family came to get her or the light changed to green. Life changer for our family. My only small negative is that the lettering on the buttons looks to be coming off, with normal usage this could wear away. May have received a bad print run. Other than that very happy and would decline recommend!
customer_reviews.author: marv

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: It's a great clock but stopped working after a year. Almost to the day. It's not something I'm going to keep buying if it won't last. My kids never touched it so it wasn't handled improperly. Just stopped working. I unplugged it and reset it. I couldn't reset the time. I pushed the set button and then the hour button and it just kept scrolling. No buttons were stuck either. I checked. The ball won't light up red anymore. Nothing. All it does is show 12:00. Really frustrating as it is a great product but I expected it to last longer. I won't be recommending it anymore. I'd feel bad if the same thing happened to them.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Pratt

customer_reviews.title: A Little Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The battery compartment is faulty. It will display for less than thirty seconds and then completely lose power. I have tried two different sets of batteries to make sure it’s not just the batteries. I can plug this into the wall and it will work just fine but my neighborhood loses power quite often so if the power goes out it will be an inconvenience. This is unfortunate because I was really excited about this product. I’m sure it has potential to be really great but the one I received is defective in the battery compartment, which is a big deal for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley55

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful kids clock
customer_reviews.text: First of all..the video explaining the clock function was just wonderful and so helpful. This clock has great features, battery or plug in, directions printed on the inside of clock setup cover, options for brightness of the ball. Easy for the child to turn off alarm. Great concept to teach children night and day. I would buy again happily.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Pongo
customer_reviews.text: The clock (or "Pongo" as our two year calls it) has been a great asset in encouraging our two year old to sleep in her own bed at night. She enjoys sleeping with the clock near her, and is unbothered by the brightness of the red light (we set it for its lowest setting). After our bedtime reading and as I close the door, she reminds me "Red to bed and green to go". Cue a full night's sleep. Good purchase. Note: does not mix well with water. We did need to purchase a second clock after our first was unceremoniously baptized by our daughter, but it was well worth the cost of replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Gee

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: Love this light! Daylight savings screwed up my 3.5 year old’s usual amazing sleep patterns of 7:30pm-6:30am, and she started waking up at 5 or even 4:30am. It took her maybe 3 days to really get the hang of the light, but now she knows to stay in her room until it turns green! Best part is that this green light stays on for hours (you can set how many) - other clocks I looked at didn’t have that option - so she won’t “miss” the green light. Only con is that the red light is very bright, even on the lowest dimmer. Luckily my daughter has night lights and doesn’t mind the light. But overall I HIGHLY recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great Concept, works really well
customer_reviews.text: Love this concept and very easy to set and the concept is easy for my 3.5 yr old to understand. My son was waking up and getting dressed at 2. 3, 4 am not knowing it wasn’t time to get up. We got this sleep trainer for him and I’m happy to say that the middle of that night wake ups have stopped. The basic red/green light concept is easy for him to understand and there’s no longer disappointment after he get himself fully dressed only to discover it’s still nighttime. The ball is still quite bright on its lowest setting would be my only feedback.
customer_reviews.author: chaney14

customer_reviews.title: Love this clock!!
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 year old loves puppies, and he's excited about this puppy clock! He does pretty well with staying in bed until it's green after practicing for a week or two. It has great settings for wakeup time, turning the alarm buzzer on/off, a nap timer, adjusting the brightness of the light, adjusting how long the green light stays on. The button on the puppy's foot is fun for my 2 year old to press himself to turn off the green light after he gets up.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hall

customer_reviews.title: TODDLER LIFESAVER!
customer_reviews.text: This clock is AWESOME! My almost 4 year old was having a hard time understanding he needed to stay in his room in the morning and not wake so early so I bought this clock. I hyped it up about how cool the dog was, etc. and so far it’s working great! He knows to stay in his bed/room until the clock turns green and knows to sleep/be quiet when it’s red. All the functions are easy to set and I love it can be battery or wall plug. Will be great to take when we go out of town. Buy it-you’ll be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: VTSweetDevil

customer_reviews.title: All of them were defective
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how this product got positive reviews. We just got the second defective one. The first worked for about a week, just enough time for my daughter to get sleep trained and fall in love with it. Then, the green light just blew and would never go on again. We ordered a replacement and it didn’t even make it through the night. I woke up and it was just flashing red with no time or anything on the screen. I loved this concept and clearly it works. I’ll get a different brand but very sad about this since my daughter loved the dog
customer_reviews.author: Angela H.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great sleep trainer clock
customer_reviews.text: Have owned and used this for 2 months now. Overall this is the best sleep timer we have tried. I love that there are 2 alarms that can be programmed (for weekdays and weekends). I have 2 small complaints. 1 is I wish the nap timer would “remember” 2 hours (or whatever we set it to). We have to set the nap timer each time we use it to 2 hours (which isn’t a huge deal, but could definitely be easier.) and 2nd complaint is the back should be just a little trickier to open. My 2 year old occasionally opens the back and pushes all the buttons 😬
customer_reviews.author: Amazon buyer

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life
customer_reviews.text: Why did I not buy this sorcery earlier?!? We got this for my son for Christmas who is always up at 4-5am I set the sleep alarm for 6:15am Which is around when my husband gets up for work in the morning. He has been sleeping until 7am since he got this clock!!!! Seriously it has been amazing! He’s in such a better mood he’s getting more sleep. This has just helped us so much! The only complaint I have is that you have to remember to turn the alarm on every night. But other than that it’s been a dream!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Cute Clock to Help Kids Sleep
customer_reviews.text: This is really cute. It has a lot of features. Watch the video. Our 2 year old loves it. I'd give it 5 stars if there were an option to have no light on the the ball during the night and just have it turn green in the morning. Even though you can dim the red ball light, it's still pretty bright. Also, you have to turn the alarm back on every night, which I tend to forget. Our son has a different ok to wake clock that automatically resets. That would be a nice feature here.
customer_reviews.author: Kimber Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Love this clock
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! We have a new baby and one morning our son got us up at 530am. That is when I ordered this clock. I'm sure it may work differently for everyone but since we have it to him, our son hasn't woken us up before the timer light goes off! He likes to look for the green light. Easy to program. We use the setting that has only the light as a timer and not a buzzer sound so if he's still asleep it won't wake him up. But the buzzer will come in handy when it's time to wake for school.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works beautifully to keep the little one in her room until it's ok to get up. Very straightforward and simple. She loves it. I like that it only has two colors (some of the more pricey ones have 3, which I think would be confusing for her). It's easy to use and cute. I also appreciate that unlike some similar products, this lets you adjust the length of time that the ball glows green; we set it for fully 2 hours since sometimes my daughter's sleep can be erratic and unpredictable and I don't want her waking up confused, trying to derive meaning from a ball that isn't glowing at all. Thank you for a lovely product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needing to return- total bust
customer_reviews.text: This was a total bust for us. Didn’t keep my 3.5 year old in bed... he also came into our room in the morning and said ‘I fixed the red light! I unplugged it and plugged it back in’. He thinks it’s a toy. The buttons in the back need to be hidden better- it’s just a flap that folds down. Some sort of child proofing to hide the controls would be great. Additionally, the battery compartment didn’t work and only worked with the plug adapter. Super disappointed and returning ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up. My boys love it. It works great for my 5 year old but he wasn't having sleep issues. My 2.5 year old does not care if its red or green. The first night he refused to go in his room because the red was on though and he understood it meant staying there haha. But if he wakes up in the middle of the night it doesn't matter to him what color it is and if I say it's still red he just screams at me... One day we'll sleep all night again, maybe...
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: I love that it is adjustable and has so many settings. Two alarm settings and a nap setting. Adjustable brightness (100% is REALLY bright), alarm buzzer optional. My kids think it’s adorable Updated 4 months later. We have had this clock for 4 months now and it has stopped working. The glowing ball will periodically flash and if you try to press any of the buttons on the back side in the parental control, the whole screen flashes and resets. This is both with it plugged in and on fresh batteries
customer_reviews.author: Robbi

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant! Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned with the number functions that this would be difficult to program. It is not! Extremely easy to use for overnights and naptime. It makes it easy for my son to understand when it is appropriate to leave bed and when he must remain a bit longer, which means that he is not in our room waking us up before the alarm goes off. I wish I had known about this sooner, and I will use it with my daughter once she moves from the crib to the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart C.

customer_reviews.title: Concept works great but product is cheap
customer_reviews.text: The reason I am giving this product 3 stars is because the concept itself works GREAT. Like shockingly great. We got this clock just praying we could get our kids to stop barging in our room waking up our baby at 5am all day and it has done wonders— we let the kids name him (they picked manny) and they are super into “listening to manny” and “waiting for manny’s ball to turn green” but we have literally had this clock for a month and it’s PLUGGED IN and the numbers are starting to disappear. I don’t know what happened but the display is obviously faulty. Will be contacting the company and hoping they send a replacement 🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Chenoa Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now!!
customer_reviews.text: Best $20 we have ever spent! Don’t wait. Don’t even read the review. Just buy it NOW! Our toddler was waking up every day between 5 and 5:30. We bought this to try and save our sanity. We’ve been using it for one week now and our toddler has stayed in bed until the light turns green every day. The first couple of days he woke up and laid in bed and played, but since then he’s gone back to sleep. He gets so excited when he sees that it’s green. He walks out and says “The light is green! Green means get up!” It was easy to set up and my little man loves his puppy alarm clock.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Crossland

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one morning in a sleep-deprived stupor and I am glad I did. We love our puppy alarm clock. My 2 1/2 year old was waking up around 5am every day. We started using the clock and now she stays in bed. When it turns green, she is excited to report it and ready to wake up. This has been a blessing in our house. I like that it has battery backup because it often gets unplugged during the day and I don't have to reset everything. It seems to be good quality. I would recommend it to other sleepless parents.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Capasso

customer_reviews.title: Lots of options, works great
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this for a few months now and it has been a great help at bedtime and wake up time. There are a TON of options - two alarm times, nap timer, buzzer on/off, dimness/brightness of light, just to name a few - which is super nice, but does lead to a learning curve to figure out which of the many buttons you need to push on the back if you just want to turn the red light on. Once you get the hang of it, though, it’s easy and my son loves that it’s a dog. Very reasonably priced, too, with all of the options compared to other versions on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great for sleep training toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this training clock to encourage my 2.5 year old to not call out for me before 7am. So far it’s working great! My only dislike of the product is the number of buttons in the back is a bit extreme. It’s not self explanatory and a bit confusing at first. Also, I haven’t figured it the nap mode. When you push the nap button, it lights up red for a 60 second count down then turns green. I’m not sure what the purpose of this feature is, but overall it’s a good product and I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. My 2 boys love it and so do I. I have it set up with no alarm sound and just the light. That way if they decide to sleep in (which they rarely do) they wont be woken up. Its really helped prevent the unsettling, Children of the Corn-style startling wake-up before sunrise. You know, when you halfway wake up early for some strange reason, crack your eyes open and see a small child standing silently and still in the dark, staring through your soul without saying a word? Yeah, I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: J Fox

customer_reviews.title: Quote possibly the best money I've ever spent
customer_reviews.text: My two-year-old was getting up at 4:45am, 5am, etc. I was a zombie. Behold doggy clock. We made a big deal of her being a big girl now with her big girl doggy clock to tell her when it's sleeping time and when it's wake-up time - and BOOM. Sleep. Glorious, beautiful sleep. She knows that she has to wait for the light to turn green before calling for Mommy in the morning. She loves it. I love it. I love you, Doggy Clock.
customer_reviews.author: Max D

customer_reviews.title: Love this clock!
customer_reviews.text: I debated getting a more expensive wake up clock, but picked this one because it was reasonably priced. I am so glad I did! My daughter absolutely LOVES it. She sleeps with it in her bed and waits until it turns green to get out. After 2 years of sleeping in until 8:00 or 8:30, she began waking around 6:30 each day which is too early for us. We set the clock for 7:00, and now even if she wakes earlier, she just plays with the puppy until it turns green at 7:00. Really glad I went with the puppy instead of the other fancier clocks.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S

customer_reviews.title: This clock is the BEST!! WE GET MORE SLEEP!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. AMAZING. My daughter watches for the light to change and stays quiet in her crib until it does, which means I get more sleep! Hallelujah!! My daughter is 30 months, and it works so well for her. She loves the dog and kisses and hugs it goodnight and at nap time. Amazing product that would be worth 2x the money!! I also like that there is an instruction sticker on the flap of the controls. Excellent idea! Love, love, love this clock!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Smallwood

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my 2-year-old in bed until he gets the green light (literally).
customer_reviews.text: Love this clock. It's been perfect for training my son to not get out of bed until the doggie's ball changes from red to green. You just set it to change at whatever time you'd like. You can set the alarm with or without sound (2 different alarm settings available so you can set one for nap time and another for morning). There are lots of buttons on the back, but they all have a purpose and it's not to difficult to learn what they are all for. The manufacturer has a Youtube video that explains them all if you get confused. You can either plug it in or operate with batteries. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Short life span
customer_reviews.text: Crapped out after six weeks. Don’t be like me... trust the reviewers. The product helped my 20month old get past waking up at 5:30 every morning. I wasn’t sure she’d get the colors meaning different things but was desperate for sleep. Well, it DID work and it DID help her sleep until closer to 7 but after six weeks the clock can no longer keep time but runs fast and is, therefore, not a useful alarm clock. Now our kids wake us up at 4am to tell us the dog is green. 🤦🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Attigus

customer_reviews.title: We can sleep again!
customer_reviews.text: My 4-year-old gets on the bus to preschool at 7am, so he has to get out of bed by 6:15am to get ready. This time of year it's just as dark at 6am as it is at 3am, so he started getting out of bed in the middle of the night, and he wouldn't go back to sleep in his own bed. He wouldn't really let us go back to sleep either, unfortunately. We've been using this clock a little over a week, and it works like a charm. "If the ball is red, stay in bed," we say. And he does. At precisely 6am, the light turns green, and he bounds into our room. Amazing. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: MJM

customer_reviews.title: Effective when it works
customer_reviews.text: Purchased and arrived from Amazon at the beginning of March. Initially it worked well. Now, 25ish days after purchase, the red light just stops working in the middle of the night. Works fine for a midday nap, but I’m lying in bed at 4:45 AM writing this review, child screaming through the monitor because the red light went out and he thought it was wake up time when I went into his room to reset the red light. I’ve already put in for a new one, and if that one breaks too, I’ll be requesting a refund for a poorly made product.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Functional
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use with our 3-year-old. He loves the cute dog design and being able to press the right paw to turn the green light off in the morning. The instructional video is very helpful for setup. Best features for us - 2 alarm modes (for different weekday and weekend wake up times) and brightness level of glowing ball (3 levels - high, medium, low). We used incentives to help the alarm clock's effectiveness at first. If he stays in his room until the ball turns green, he gets a small prize or to choose what we eat for breakfast. Doesn't work 100% of the time, but it certainly has helped!
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Cute clock
customer_reviews.text: The clock must be set every night, which is not a problem for us - we made it a part of the bedtime routine. It has two alarm options I have used. The alarm has a buzzer feature or just the red/green light. I love the AC adapter feature. Our old clock was battery operated and died frequently and had to be reset each time. My only complaint is the bright red light. The entire room glows red, lol. And I wish the alarm was a dog barking instead of a regular buzzer... would have been cuter. Other than that, I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was a skeptic.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't believe it would work. I have a very stubborn three year old, but.. After being put on steroids for his asthma and the time change.. I was desperate to not be woken up at 5am. I am happy to say after working with it for less than a week, we are waking up at 6:30am with just enough time to get ready and out the door for school! He got the concept the first night, I was impressed! "Red means, let mama sleep!" "Green means, wake mama up!"
customer_reviews.author: Julia Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, I had some doubts about ordering this alarm clock for my 2 year old strong willed daughter as I did not think a simple green and red light would help her sleep in past 5-530 WRONG. I have had this clock for a week and it works great! I hear her getting up around 6 but does not fuss , she watches the dog until it turns green (I set for 630) then yells “it’s green, it’s time to get up.” This alarm clock is worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Monica T

customer_reviews.title: I think it is defective
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was great for 8 days. Completely served its purpose. But then the clock was not holding the time, and the alarm had reset itself or something because it was not the time I had programmed. I could not fix the clock, I would press on that button, but I could never set up a new time. I had to reset the whole thing, and it worked. I will see in a few days how it goes, and I may just send it back. If there is problems after a week, it is never a good sign.
customer_reviews.author: Emma delphine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: We started using this a few weeks ago with our twin boys (age 2 1/2) when they started fighting with us about bedtime. This clock has been SO helpful! The simple red/green light system is really easy for them to understand. We say, “when the light is red, we go to bed.” No fighting or discussion. It’s really easy to set up, seems to be very durable (it’s been dropped and thrown quite a few times already), and is a great value. After a few days, they stopped fighting bedtime and it has been much more peaceful around our house. We even bought one for our daycare provider to be consistent. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Daily

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year old sleeps in now!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I really love this product. It works so well my 3 year old has gotten smart enough to pull the cord out of the wall because he doesn't like it 😂 It really helped us establish him understanding when he needs to be in bed and when he can get out of bed. At night before I tuck him in I set it and it turns red and in the morning it turns green and he turns the paw off and can leave his room. What disappointed me the most is that you have to reset it every night. It won't automatically turn red. Overall really happy though!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn White

customer_reviews.title: A Sleep Saver!
customer_reviews.text: This clock is so great. It’s easy to use and effective. My 5 year old likes to start his day (and mine) whenever he wakes up in the morning. Could be 5:00 am, could be 6:30. He wasn’t getting the sleep his body (or mine) needed because he would wake up and not know that it’s still bedtime and wouldn’t fall back to sleep easily once he was out of bed. Now, when he wakes up and sees that the ball is still red, he goes back to sleep. I feel better knowing he’s getting the rest he needs, and in turn, I’m getting the rest I need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this alarm clock and so does my 3 year old. I got it as a trainer for the weekends and to help with daily wake-ups. I love that this clock had 3 different alarms I could set and could turn the buzzer on/off! My kid can sleep through the buzzer at times and is still getting used to staying in bed until the light turns green, but he doesn't go to bed unless the red light is on. Very easy to set and use!
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Not as reliable as I hope
customer_reviews.text: Everything is functioning as advertised except for one annoying thing. Why does the buzzer set to on as the default? This has happened twice in the past week where it appears the clock resets itself with the clock being wrong and the buzzer turned back on. All of a sudden it starts beeping at 1am waking everyone up. It has happened twice now. If it happens again, I’ll have to return this
customer_reviews.author: Latif Alianto

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 5yo foster child who would get up at 4am and then proceed to wake all the children to play. Set up was pretty easy. I liked how there are 2 different alarms settings. We used one for weekdays/school days and one for weekends. It was easy for him to shut off when the alarm goes off and the light is nice and bright which doubled as a night light.
customer_reviews.author: ashley towell

customer_reviews.title: Light never turns off so it disrupts sleep, too easy for toddlers to press buttons.
customer_reviews.text: The bright red light stays on all night. This is supposed to help my child sleep, not keep him awake all night with a creepy glowing red light. This should have a setting to keep all lights off during sleep time. The parent compartment is way too easy for kids to open and press buttons. If we had kept this, we would have had to place it out of reach.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: The power of the puppy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is such an awesome idea! My 5 year old likes to get up super early and tried many things to try and keep him in bed. Turns out, all I needed was a puppy clock! It is easy to program and set. You can set 2 separate alarms but only 1 can be on at a time. You can also adjust the brightness and the duration of the green light. I turn on the red light at bedtime and then it turns green at 6:30am and stays green for 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: ACP

customer_reviews.title: No more sleepless nights!
customer_reviews.text: Love this clock! My son use to start coming into our room starting at 430. I use to turn the TV on and let him watch cartoons which I hated but he wouldn't play in his room nor leave me to sleep a little longer. All that has changed since we got his clock! Now he loves to play in his room and also sleeps longer! He loves to come and get me and show me the light has changed! This works! I couldn't be more happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: All the right options
customer_reviews.text: I love that you can do the alarm with just the ball and not the buzzer. I love that there are 2 alarm settings so you can have them stay in bed a little longer on the weekends. Being able to change the brightness of the ball is nice too as my son doesn’t like a lot of light at night. Overall I give this 5 stars. The only reason for 4 stars on “ease of use” is because the buttons and writing are pretty tiny so I consistently seem to hit the wrong button.
customer_reviews.author: Tessaj30

customer_reviews.title: This actually worked for us
customer_reviews.text: My kid was getting up at 5:30 every morning. After we explained that the red light meant sleep and the green light meant wake up time, they totally got it! Our kid waits until the green light and then gets out of bed. It's amazing. It's worked for the last month. Fingers crossed it stays this way! The dog itself is pretty ugly but my kid likes it. The different brightness setting is good. One annoying thing is that every time it gets unplugged, you have to reset the time and alarm. But it's pretty simple to reset.
customer_reviews.author: bookand wine enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Changed our entire lives!
customer_reviews.text: At the risk of sounding over-the-top, this clock saved us. Our daughter loves dogs which helped too, but she immediately took to waiting until the light turned green until she was allowed to come out of her room to wake us up. We can now sleep in a bit longer in peace. It also keeps her in her room at night without us having to even keep the door closed. Like I said, this product changed our lives!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Runey

customer_reviews.title: We get more sleep now!
customer_reviews.text: It took about a week to get our 2 year old trained with this clock. Her first morning coming into our room saying "It's greeeeeeen!" is something we still laugh about! Down side is this clock only lasted us about a year and a half. The top row of buttons on the back stopped working so we just bought a new one, that is why I gave 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Mavis

customer_reviews.title: A lot of options, can even control the brightness ...
customer_reviews.text: A lot of options, can even control the brightness of light and durations they stay on. I wish you could lock the back of the dog so my daughter stops opening it up and hitting buttons. :)
customer_reviews.author: mr cesario

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought this ages ago
customer_reviews.text: Love it! So many options. Sooooo many options. Read through the directions once and you are good to go. Plus they have the directions printed right in the darn thing for you! Could it have more features? Of course. But what it has is great. Red ball stays on the whole time kiddo is to be in bed and the green ball can stay lit for up to two hours. Definitely helped my kindergartener grasp the concept of wake up time vs. stay in bed time.
customer_reviews.author: C. Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for our stubborn boy.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old didn’t care if the light was green or red. Ugh! Everyone said it would work. It didn’t. He marched out of his room no matter what color the ball was. If it was red I would gently remind him “the lights not green yet, bud.” And he’d say “so? I don’t wanna be in there anymore.” For us it’s now just a $30 clock on a shelf. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: BGill

customer_reviews.title: Toddler Loves It (round 2 buyer)
customer_reviews.text: I loved this item...for about 2 weeks. Then the programming stopped working, so the clock would always reset when I touched it. I sent it back to try and get a different version of a sleep training clock. But the design is super cute and my son loved the puppy. UPDATE: Bought a new one and it works like a CHARM! My toddler adores it. One quirk - it does go through the batteries fast, so I like to keep it plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: AstrosFan1313

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: My 3-1/2yo son loved and died by the red and green...for about 2 weeks. Now he’s more likely to ignore it but at least I have something to point to when he gets up too early in the mornings. And it definitely keeps him in bed at night prior to the early morning. I just wish the buttons were easier to read. Basically trying to memorize their location. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bosco

customer_reviews.title: My daughter finally stays in bed
customer_reviews.text: My daughter would wake up in the middle of the night, thinking it is morning. With the super easy color system, she goes back to sleep when it is on red, and gets up when it is on green. There are tons of ways you can set this up - 2 different alarms, nap timer etc. You decide when the light turns green and how long it stays on for. We love it. Only downside, it runs through batteries really fast, and I can't find the adapter that came with it to use it with an outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Mgw2102

customer_reviews.title: Fail! Keeps losing time, alarm goes off at odd hours
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't keep time. I have it plugged on AC power and this clock keeps losing time. Which also means the alarm keeps going off at odd times. First time it happened, i thought my husband messed with it in dark, while trying to set alarm. (He didnt read the entire panel of instructions). Day before i reset the clock time, and the alarm - next morning it was off by 2.5 hours! If it were on battery , i would have thought battery needed replacement. But no this is on AC power. Last evening i decided to try one last time and same! I will be returning it this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Divya Singh

customer_reviews.title: Overall very good, but the dimmest light setting is still too bright
customer_reviews.text: My two-year-old immediately loved the dog and understood the concept of "red means stay in bed" and "green means wake up." Early morning wake-ups are gone now that we have this clock. The controls are a tiny bit complicated, as mentioned by other reviewers, but easy enough after you learn how to operate. The only real negative for us is the brightness. My kids are used to sleeping in a very dark room and this clock, even at 25% brightness, is very bright. We have to cover the light with a small, thick towel in order to tone down the brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful!!! The red light/green light system has worked so well for my little girl. She now knows when to stay in bed & when it’s ok to get up. The settings are very easy to program, clear display. We don’t use the buzzer so I can’t comment on that. The lights aren’t too bright, but brightness can be adjusted if desired. Love everything about it! This product has allowed everyone in the house to sleep in.
customer_reviews.author: Josie Julian

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a little while
customer_reviews.text: This item is super cute and my boys loved it, but it stopped working within 6 months. First defect was it stopped lighting up red when the alarm was set, which my son really liked. Next, the alarm doesn't even go off. It's set to go off, but nothing happens on multiple attempts. Disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Corin E Hammitt

customer_reviews.title: Every parent needs one of these for their toddler
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, ingenious invention. Toddlers have no sense of time and cannot read clocks, but as long as they can differentiate red and green colors, they can know when it's "wake-up time. If you're toddler keeps getting up too early in the morning and won't go back to bed, you need this clock! Our daughter loves it and helps her even feel more secure in bed and naps because she knows when it's ok to get up and when to stay in bed. There's a clock to set for morning alarm clocks as well as a timer for naps. Best money I've ever spent in my life. Seriously... You need this clock!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Buy this if you love headaches and want your children to get no sleep!
customer_reviews.text: This product looks cute. We have had this for only a month now and it has been very problematic. At first, the green light was just turning on early or not staying on at the right time. But now it has starting beeping frantically at 4:30 AM every night! The buzzer is supposedly off and the green light is set to turn on at 9. There is no setting that would indicate this to happen. The seller has been contacted and I'm waiting for a response now.
customer_reviews.author: lisa stubbs

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I got this clock because my son has always woken up early, between 4 and 530. Even after cutting his naps he still wakes up at 5am (he's 4 now). My goal wasn't to get more sleep just for me, but also for him as I can tell he's tired and the day is harder as a result. I set this clock for 645 and turned off the buzzer so just the green light would come on. Even if he's awake, he stays in his room until the green light and then comes downstairs. We're very happy with this clock. Finally we get to sleep in more than we ever have!
customer_reviews.author: N. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver for parents of early-risers and nap-avoiders!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using this clock for years now with GREAT success! My 3yo went from leaving her room every five minutes to FINALLY falling asleep for naps! And she went from waking earlier and earlier in the morning to staying in her room until 6:25! I was losing my mind. Now that she and her sister share a room, I have TWO kids who don’t wander or wake early! I recommend this clock to EVERYONE!
customer_reviews.author: BDeWitt

customer_reviews.title: Fragile and a bit difficult
customer_reviews.text: It's not very user friendly. There are many small buttons, all the same shape, with tiny hard-to-read labels. You must turn on a bright light to read them, which is a bit counterproductive at bedtime when you're trying to keep things dim and dark. And unfortunately you must set the alarm at bedtime because it can't be programmed to turn itself on at bedtime. The plastic is cheap. Better keep it out of kid's reach or they'll break it.
customer_reviews.author: A.R.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old was getting out of bed at 2 or 3 in the morning and watching TV. I got this and it has been a life saver. If the dogs ball is red, stay in bed. If it's green then it's wake up time. Easy to use and program. You can adjust the brightness, you can have up to two alarms or not have any at all. It's a great clock for the kid who keeps getting out of bed.
customer_reviews.author: jlrt2011

customer_reviews.title: Fun idea
customer_reviews.text: So many buttons! Maybe a little too many. Works as expected. Can set 2 different alarms. My toddler (2.5) might not fully understand it yet. We tell her every night “Red means bed” “Green means get up and go”. She climbs out of bed before it turns green every day. Hopefully she’ll learn it better and might work when she’s older.
customer_reviews.author: Kankin13

customer_reviews.title: The answer to my full night sleep prayers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on recommendation after mentioning that my son would wake up at all hours and come to see mommy. It took about a week for him to grasp the concept but now my husband and I are able to sleep all night, every night. We literally don’t know what we would have done had we not found this clock and a solution to our nightly wake up calls.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob's Keep

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best clock.
customer_reviews.text: We have gone through several clocks for our toddler boys. This one is great because they under stand the red and green/ stop and go concept. You can turn the buzzer on or off. You have 2 alarms (weekday and weekend is how we use it). You can turn the red light on at night or just have the green light come on. I love how you can customize it to you needs.
customer_reviews.author: Justin K.

customer_reviews.title: Eh it’s ok I guess
customer_reviews.text: This clock meets the basic advertised qualities. It’s just kind of a pain to use. The buttons under the hidden panel in the back are hard to see without a magnifying glass in sunlight at exactly noon on a Tuesday. My 2-1/2 year old also figured out how to use this thing in like ten mins and is able to make the red light turn green and then announces its time to get up haha
customer_reviews.author: M&D

customer_reviews.title: One Battery Use and Now DEAD
customer_reviews.text: We loved our clock when we first got it. It served its purpose. My daughter waited for the green light to wake up. It lasted about 3 months and then the batteries died. When I went to replace the batteries, one of the batteries was crusty and molded. I tried to clean it out with a dry towel but now the new batteries do not work. The clock will turn on and then start blinking and flashing. I tried different batteries and the same problem. I am disappointed that I only got one battery life out of this.
customer_reviews.author: kari p

customer_reviews.title: Variety of Features
customer_reviews.text: Has every single feature I wanted to help teach my toddler to stay in bed: can have the buzzer off, turn the light down very low to not keep her awake, can set multiple alarms and timers for naps and bedtime. Is super easy to use, once you get the hang of it. Have been recommending this to other toddler moms already! Wish I'd had this with my other kids, super thankful I found it now!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chaz

customer_reviews.title: Best investment for extra sleep!
customer_reviews.text: Best investment I ever made! My son just transitioned into a “big boy bed” and was running into our room before the sun came up. One of my friends suggested one of these stop/go alarm clocks. I was hesitant at first but decided to go ahead and order it and try it out. My son loves it!!! It’s like a game to him and he loves to wait until the light turns green to get out of bed.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Super effective for my 3 year old night owl
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old daughter who loves to play in her room at ALL hours of the night. She was super excited to have her “doggie” in her room and she now knows when it’s okay to get out of bed to play in her room. I know she follows the light color signals because we have a video monitor in her room. The lights help her stay in bed and fall back asleep because the light is still red. In the upcoming week, I think I might start an incentives chart to reward her for sleeping longer and relying on the colored lights.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Cute and helpful
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our oldest daughter since she kept getting up earlier than us on the weekends and now with this virus keeping us inside. It was frustrating telling her to stay in bed. This has been a saving grace. It is so easy to use our daughter can set it herself before bed. Worth the money. And it is a cute dog. Can’t go wrong with that.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

product_meta.title: Big Red Rooster BRRC105 Sleep Training Alarm Clock for Kids | Plug in Kids Alarm Clock | Toddler Clock | Boy Or Girls Alarm Clock | Childrens Alarm Clock | Time to Wake Clock
feature_bullets: TRAINS CHILDREN TO STAY IN BED LONGER – Parents get to sleep. No more 5 AM wake up calls
BALL GLOWS RED OR GREEN - Red means time to sleep; green means time to wake up. The ball glows red at night and turns green at the alarm time
2 ALARMS AND A NAP TIMER - Perfect for a weekday alarm time, weekend alarm time and naps. Alarm must be set each night
HIDDEN PARENT COMPARTMENT - Children cannot change the settings or turn the alarm off early. Instructions printed inside parent compartment
POWER SOURCE - Powered by an AC adaptor (included). 3 AA battery backup

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,955 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
